ygData.subject: Re: Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or feature?

ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 1:47 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or feature?


>From: jhenders@...
>
>On Wed, Jun 30/99, "J.R. Hyde" <jr@...> wrote:
>>
>> but i still havent heard an answer... is the canceling effect of songs
like
>> levitate/underwater breathing intentional or a bug?
>
>I'd say, seeing as the effect comes back after you zone, that it's most
>likely a bug.
>
>--
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
> GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
> b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
>
>


This is what J.M. had to say about it,
<begin quote>
From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>

Selos, SoW, SoC, Consonant Chain, Snare, Enstill, Grasping Roots etc, all
cancel out like effects, first in, first out.

So, Selos will cancel root for any member in the party, while leaving the
root icon in place for the normal duration.

You can also break yourself out of root indoors, by casting Consonant Chain
on yourself. Sure, you move *very* slow, but at least you're moving..;)

I've also blasted myself off a ledge while rooted, using Bellow. Bought me
enough time to escape as the mobs ran around and down to get at me again,
and hurt less than the pounding they were giving me.

<end quote>

(I have [eqbards] routed to a seperate folder, and see no reason to delete
them,
the curse of new, big hard drives <g>)

Tindayen, 15th bard on Povar
